project1.title: Pet Adoption Website
project1.description: A project of designing a pet adoption website where pictures of pets are displayed on the main page and when a button with the pet name is clicked the clicked button animal only displays in the webpage.
project1.technologiesUsed: jQuery, AJAX and JSON, Task Automation, CSS Animations, Version Control with Github

project2.title: Ex-Tracker
project2.description: An ex-tracker app where a user is able to track their ex by the location and time of the day.
project2.technologiesUsed: jQuery, AJAX and JSON, Task Automation, CSS Animations, Version Control with Github

project3.title: Pet Adoption Website
project3.description: An application that is built using React. This app is to help parents/guardians find any kind activities and allows them to add other activities they know of and be able to save and share the activities they are interested on or like
project3.technologiesUsed: jQuery, AJAX and JSON, Task Automation, CSS Animations, Version Control with Github, React, Npm
